title: Trello can help a travel agency
summary:
We [IGoMorocco](https://www.igomorocco.com/) use Trello for managing our team projects, it is simple and easy to use.  very easy to get started with. 
Trello is a great project management tool for tour companies. It helped us to plan and organize our tours from start to finish. You can create boards for each desert tour, and then use lists and cards to track different aspects of the tour, such as logistics, marketing, and sales.
 It can help to streamline the planning and execution of trips .Trello can be used to plan trips by creating boards for each trip. These boards can be divided into lists for different aspects of the trip, such as flights, accommodations, activities, and transportation. Cards can then be created for each task or subtask, and these cards can be assigned to team members. This helps to keep track of all of the tasks that need to be completed for each trip, and it also helps to ensure that everyone on the team is aware of their responsibilities.
strength: It can help to streamline the planning and execution of trips .Trello can be used to plan trips by creating boards for each trip. These boards can be divided into lists for different aspects of the trip, such as flights, accommodations, activities, and transportation. Cards can then be created for each task or subtask, and these cards can be assigned to team members. This helps to keep track of all of the tasks that need to be completed for each trip...
weakness: It can help to streamline the planning and execution of trips .Trello can be used to plan trips by creating boards for each trip. These boards can be divided into lists for different aspects of the trip, such as flights, accommodations, activities, and transportation. reason: Reviews are accepted only from clients of the company
title: Don't lose your chance to get more for a fair price
summary: My team works on our website optimization and gives our client optimization recommendations. So we looked for software that would cover all needs without other software integration, and we found it. WebCEO matched our budget and the tasks to be done.
strength: From the first touch to the most profound immersion, WebCEO shows itself amazingly. Easy to navigate and customs, beneficial for our websites and customers' site optimization. Handy tools and features that meet everybody's requirements.
weakness: If it has some disadvantages, we haven't faced them.

title: Support is horrible
summary: Support for the product is horrible.  Features that come as part of the product often break and they try to charge you to fix.  An example is trying to export even an email or two for compliance reasons does not work without rebooting the server it is on.  Instead of trouble shooting the issue they try and sell you "Professional Services" to help export.
strength: Works except when it doesn't work

title: SUPERB
summary: I love the customizability and the ability to automate work flows. The customer Service has also been quite good in terms of communication and making sure I'm very conversant with the ATS system
strength: I love its user friendly nature
weakness: I wish there was better integration with some of the major job boards
